name: Paint-A-Potion
description:
Created as a submission the GGJ 23. The Theme was "Roots"

Fullfill orders from customers by mixing potions in the right color using locally sourced organic root vegetables.
1. A customer will request a potion through the grammophone.
2. Grab any of the pre-chopped root veggies on the tray to your right and drop them into the juicer.
3. Mix the different colors of your beets & roots to match the order on the colored sheet.
4. Use water to dilute your potion and lighten the color.
5. Click on the potion flask once you are happy with the potion color!
